item.title: Coraline add a quote by Anais Nin
item.description: "Love never dies a natural death. It dies because we don't know how to replenish its source. It dies of blindness and errors and betrayals. It dies of illness and wounds; it dies of weariness, of witherings, of tarnishings." -- Anais Nin

item.title: Coraline add a quote by Nicholas Sparks
item.description: "I am nothing special, of this I am sure. I am a common man with common thoughts and I've led a common life. There are no monuments dedicated to me and my name will soon be forgotten, but I've loved another with all my heart and soul, and to me, this has always been enough.." -- Nicholas Sparks

item.title: Coraline add a quote by Rainer Maria Rilke
item.description: "Perhaps all the dragons in our lives are princesses who are only waiting to see us act, just once, with beauty and courage. Perhaps everything that frightens us is, in its deepest essence, something helpless that wants our love." -- Rainer Maria Rilke

item.title: Coraline add a quote by Marisa de los Santos
item.description: "Everything turned on the word "we", a synonym for love, the thing that saves us all." -- Marisa de los Santos

item.title: Coraline add a quote by Robert Goolrick
item.description: "If you don't receive love from the ones who are meant to love you, you will never stop looking for it." -- Robert Goolrick

item.title: Coraline add a quote by Andrew Carnegie
item.description: "There is not such a cradle of democracy upon the earth as the Free Public Library, this republic of letters, where neither rank, office, nor wealth receives the slightest consideration." -- Andrew Carnegie

item.title: Coraline add a quote by Stuart Dybek
item.description: "The public library is where place and possibility meet." -- Stuart Dybek

item.title: Coraline add a quote by Cicero
item.description: "If you have a garden and a library, you have everything you need." -- Cicero

item.title: Coraline add a quote by Gail Carson Levine
item.description: "A library is infinity under a roof." -- Gail Carson Levine
